Sifrr Element Examples

Sifrr-Tabs with menu and content

<sifrr-tabs> <li slot='heading'>Heading 1</li> <li slot='heading'>Heading 2 - very longggggggg</li> <div slot='tab'> Tab 1 </div> <div slot='tab'> Tab 2 </div> </sifrr-tabs>
  • Heading 1
  • Heading 2 - very longggggggg
    • Tab 1
    Tab 2

    Sifrr-Tabs without menu, with arrows

    <sifrr-tabs options='{ "showMenu": false, "showArrows": true }'> <div slot='tab'> Tab 1 </div> <div slot='tab'> Tab 2 </div> </sifrr-tabs>
    Tab 1
    Tab 2

    Sifrr-Tabs without menu, with arrows, looped

    <sifrr-tabs options='{ "showMenu": false, "showArrows": true, "loop": true }'> <div slot='tab'> Tab 1 </div> <div slot='tab'> Tab 2 </div> </sifrr-tabs>
    Tab 1
    Tab 2

    Sifrr-Tabs without multiple tabs (integer) in view

    <sifrr-tabs options='{ "showMenu": false, "showArrows": true, "num": 3 }'> <div slot='tab'> Tab 1 </div> <div slot='tab'> Tab 2 </div> <div slot='tab'> Tab 3 </div> <div slot='tab'> Tab 4 </div> <div slot='tab'> Tab 5 </div> <div slot='tab'> Tab 6 </div> </sifrr-tabs>
    Tab 1
    Tab 2
    Tab 3
    Tab 4
    Tab 5
    Tab 6

    Sifrr-Tabs without multiple tabs in view, looped, and arrow steps more than 1

    <sifrr-tabs options='{ "showMenu": false, "showArrows": true, "num": 3, "loop": true, "step": 3 }'> <div slot='tab'> Tab 1 </div> <div slot='tab'> Tab 2 </div> <div slot='tab'> Tab 3 </div> <div slot='tab'> Tab 4 </div> <div slot='tab'> Tab 5 </div> <div slot='tab'> Tab 6 </div> </sifrr-tabs>
    Tab 1
    Tab 2
    Tab 3
    Tab 4
    Tab 5
    Tab 6

    Sifrr-Tabs with pre defined tab height

    <sifrr-tabs options='{ "tabHeight": "100px" }'> <li slot='heading'>Heading 1</li> <li slot='heading'>Heading 2</li> <div slot='tab'> Tab 1 </div> <div slot='tab'> Tab 2 </div> </sifrr-tabs>
  • Heading 1
  • Heading 2
    • Tab 1
    Tab 2

    Sifrr-Tabs with no animation

    <sifrr-tabs options='{ "animation": "none" }'> <li slot='heading'>Heading 1</li> <li slot='heading'>Heading 2</li> <div slot='tab'> Tab 1 </div> <div slot='tab'> Tab 2 </div> </sifrr-tabs>
  • Heading 1
  • Heading 2
    • Tab 1
    Tab 2

    Sifrr-Tabs with arrowMargins

    <sifrr-tabs options='{ "showMenu": false, "showArrows": true, "arrowMargin": 25 }'> <div slot='tab'> Tab 1 </div> <div slot='tab'> Tab 2 </div> </sifrr-tabs>
    Tab 1
    Tab 2
